question: Which airport is to develop the Jewar airport on the outskirts of Delhi?
explanation: Zurich Airport International AG will develop the Jewar Airport on the outskirts of Delhi, officials said after the Swiss company on November 29 outbid competitors like Adani and DIAL for what is billed to be the biggest airport in the country. The Switzerland-headquartered company, which runs the Zurich Airport, made the highest per passenger bid, beating Delhi International Airport Limited (DIAL), Adani Enterprises and Anchorage Infrastructure Investments Holdings Limited.
